Package asciipanel

Class AsciiFont

java.lang.Object
asciipanel.AsciiFont
public class AsciiFont
extends java.lang.Object
This class holds information about a loaded font, that is the glyph collection and the width and height in pixels of glyphs.
Author:
Lorenzo Bianchi

  • Constructor Details

    • AsciiFont

      public AsciiFont​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage glyphSprite, int glyphWidth, int glyphHeight)
      Class constructor
      Parameters:
      glyphSprite - image containing a 16x16 grid of glyphs
      glyphWidth - glyph width in pixels
      glyphHeight - glyph height in pixels

  • Method Details

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Gets font glyph width in pixels.
      Returns:
      font glyph width in pixels

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Gets font glyph height in pixels.
      Returns:
      font glyph height in pixels

    • getGlyph

      public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getGlyph​(int i)
      Returns the font glyph corresponding to the given ASCII character code.
      Parameters:
      i - an ASCII character code between 0 and 255
      Returns:
      a BufferedImage containing a font glyph

    • fromResource

      public static AsciiFont fromResource​(java.lang.String path, int glyphWidth, int glyphHeight) throws java.io.IOException
      Builds a AsciiFont instance from the specified sprite resource
      Parameters:
      path - the path of the sprite image resource to load
      glyphWidth - glyph width in pixels
      glyphHeight - glyph height in pixels
      Returns:
      initialized AsciiFont instance
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - thrown if an error occurs while loading the resource
